duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide clinical services to clients identified as experiencing substance use disorders within the Boston Municipal Courts.
Complete assessments and provide recommendations for and connection to appropriate treatment services based on client needs.
Conduct SUD screenings, level of care assessments, and referrals to treatment for court-involved individuals.
Coordinate the development of a treatment plan and linkages to community agencies.
Engage with criminal justice system agencies to educate about emergency services and develop working relationships.
Provide consultation and communication with the Court and Probation Department regarding client oversight and compliance.
Develop processes for clients to apply for medical insurance, housing subsidies, and other entitlement programs.

education_certification.credential: Master's Degree in Social Work or Mental Health Counseling
